name: Who is this Hero? Quiz | Heroes | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the pilot episode "Genesis", who was Isaac dating?
questions.explanation:
Simone.

	Simone Deveaux breaks up with Isaac and later begins to date Peter Petrelli, who has the power to mimic other people's powers. Simone is played by Tawny Cypress, while Peter is played by Milo Ventimiglia. Simone was later killed when Isaac and Peter fought each other.

questions.text: Isaac has painted a picture of Peter and Simone kissing. What is the weather like?
questions.explanation:
It is raining.

	Isaac and Simone broke up over his heroin addiction; Isaac believes he needs it to paint the future, although heroin is a very dangerous drug and he has been through rehab for it at least twice. Isaac is later killed by Sylar.

questions.text: Hiro Nakamura can teleport himself to different places! What other power does he have?
questions.explanation:
Time control.

	Masi Oka portays the office worker Hiro, who first teleported himself from Tokyo to New York City. He later uses his chronal powers to stop time and save people from accidents or explosions, and can freeze time and makes unexpected jumps forward and backward in time.

questions.text: D.L. Hawkins can move through solid matter, both organic and inorganic. Which character is his estranged wife?
questions.explanation:
Niki Sanders.

	Hawkins, played by Leonard Roberts, is a wrongly convicted prisoner who escapes from jail using his newfound power. He can also use his power in combat, although it may prove more harmful than intended. D.L. and Niki have a son, Micah.

questions.text: Claire Bennet is a high school cheerleader living in Oklahoma.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Claire lives with her family in Texas, not Oklahoma. Claire has the power to heal from any injury, enabling her to put herself in life-threatening situations such as running into a burning building to save lives. Claire is played by Hayden Panettiere.

questions.text: Adrian Pasdar plays a character who can fly! To which character is his character related?
questions.explanation:
Peter Petrelli.

	Nathan Petrelli, Pasdar's character, is a congressional candidate who wants to hide his powers rather than reveal them. His younger brother, Peter, can mimic other people's powers. Later in the season it is revealed that Nathan is also Claire's father.

questions.text: Matt Parkman has the power of telepathy! What is his occupation?
questions.explanation:
Policeman.

	Greg Grunberg plays Matt Parkman, a policeman who struggles with his dyslexia. Parkman has a rocky marriage and a demanding job, and later found out that his wife had been cheating on him. Matt reconciles with his wife, whom reveals that she is pregnant.

questions.text: Micah Sanders uses his powers to make a broken telephone function in "Nothing to Hide".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Micah is capable of repairing broken machines and is a child prodigy at the age of ten. His mother is Niki Sanders, who has an evil alternate personality, and his father is D.L. Hawkins, who can phase through organic and inorganic material. Micah is played by Noah Gray-Cabey. Micah also fixes an election so that Nathan wins a seat in Congress.

questions.text: Which character did Niki call to ask for help in finding her son?
questions.explanation:
Nathan Petrelli.

	Nathan pretends that he doesn't know Niki, and hangs up on her. Niki, who has an amoral alternate personality with super-strength, is played by Ali Larter.

questions.text: Peter Petrelli has met an alternate version of Hiro Nakamura.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This version of Hiro did not wear glasses, had longer hair and carried a sword. He also seemed to have greater control over his chronal powers; Mohinder was frozen in time thanks to them!
